params.autoExecute: Whether to auto-execute after all approvals
params.cutoffDate: Timestamp after which the settlement expires
params.factoryAddress: The address of the IATKXvPSettlementFactory contract.
params.flows: Array of token flows for this settlement

ETHTransfersNotAllowed().notice: Custom error for when direct ETH transfers to the proxy are attempted.

ImplementationNotSetInFactory().notice: Custom error when the factory does not have an implementation address set for the XvP settlement.

InitializationWithZeroAddress().notice: Custom error when attempting to initialize the proxy with a zero address for the implementation.

InvalidFactoryAddress().notice: Custom error when the provided factory address is invalid (e.g. zero address or does not support the required interface).

userdoc.notice: This contract is a proxy that delegates calls to an implementation of ATKXvPSettlement. The implementation address is fetched from a specified ATKXvPSettlementFactory contract.

devdoc.details: This proxy is intended to be deployed by ATKXvPSettlementFactory. It stores the factory address and uses it to determine the logic contract.

params.autoExecute: Whether to auto-execute after all approvals
params.cutoffDate: Timestamp after which the settlement expires
params.factoryAddress: The address of the IATKXvPSettlementFactory contract.
params.flows: Array of token flows for this settlement

devdoc.title: Proxy for ATKXvPSettlement, managed by a factory.
